short_info: Boasting stunning views of Central Park and Manhattan's Upper East Side, these 550 square foot Signature Rooms feature four-fixture bathrooms and are situated on floors 12 to 39.
room_features:
Room Features

Boasting stunning views of Central Park and Manhattan's Upper East Side, these 550 square foot Signature Rooms feature four-fixture bathrooms and are situated on floors 12 to 39.

Bed & Bath Experience

The Signature King room has an entry foyer and 2 double door closets. Designed with a soft color palette, the bedroom contains a plush king sized bed flanked by two nightstands, Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. An executive writing desk and chair is located opposite the bed and a 40” TV on a console is across the bed with minibar. Two comfortable armchairs with side table is also featured in the room.

The four fixture Turkish clad marble bathroom features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, bathtub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro amenities.
additional-info: Featuring four-fixture bathrooms and stunning views of Central Park, our 550 square foot Signature Rooms also feature spectacular Manhattan views. These rooms are situated on floors 12 to 39.
service_amenities:
Service includes 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary hotel Jaguar service subject to availability, an Award-winning Les Clefs d'Or Concierge team to assist guests.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 4 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes and Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in.  For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
